issue.title: [Python] Make manylinux1 base image independent of Python patch releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we have hardcoded some patch release versions of Python. As the image is continuously updated, this breaks from time to time.
